capability.name: Factoring
capability.definition: This Service Domain supports a factoring service for corporate customers enabling them to convert accounts receivable into immediate funds at a discount
capability.role: A bank offers factoring services to buy a customers' accounts receivable at a discount to provide short term liquidity. The bank will subsequently process the accounts receivable to recover purchase costs. In cases the bank may factor portions of the accounts receivable to a specialist third party
capability.example: The Bank buys (factors) a batch of a corporate's customer invoices at a suitable discount to provide short term liquidity to the corporate. The bank processes the subsequent customer payments
